cont.entity_a: Clean acoustics and crisp bass. Highlights deficiencies in lower bitrate audio files.
cont.entity_b: Clear audio. Awesome surround sound effect, enhancing gaming and movie experiences.

cont.entity_a: Very comfortable fit, even for long periods and with glasses. Lightweight and do not cause ear fatigue over extended use.
cont.entity_b: Ears can become sore after prolonged use.

cont.entity_a: Plastic cracking over time, though they remain functional.
Open-ear design results in sound leakage, not ideal for quiet environments.
cont.entity_b: Not RF-based, reducing interference but limiting mobility. Volume control can be tricky due to sensor blockage.
Pricey but offers good performance and sound quality.

cont.entity_a: Long cable can be cumbersome but is replaceable.
Modifications like removing foam can improve bass response.
Not the best for heavy bass lovers compared to other models.
Require an adapter for 3.5mm use, which is included.
Excellent for various uses like gaming, music, and movies.
cont.entity_b: Infrared technology requires line-of-sight to function properly. Rechargeable batteries included, but replacements are expensive. Suitable for short-range use, but not ideal for mobility. Good range and ideal for listening 10-15 feet from the source. Some users report static and sound fading issues.
